mapper.select: select aid,studentName,subjectName,examStart,examEnd,examManageId from apply_message ap inner join student s on s.sid = ap.studentId inner join subject sub on sub.sid = ap.subjectId inner join exam_manage em on em.eid = ap.examManageId where studentName = #{name}

select sm.sid,studentName,subjectName,em.eid,score from score_manage sm inner join student stu on stu.sid = sm.studentId inner join apply_message am on am.aid = sm.applyManageId inner join subject sub on sub.sid = am.subjectId inner join exam_manage em on em.eid = am.examManageId where stu.studentName = #{name}
